content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith

content: Hello, thank you for considering my property. We can certainly discuss the rental price. May I ask if you have any specific requirements or expectations in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want the lowest price possible. I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am dependable and responsible.

Please let me know your proposal and I will negotiate with you.

Thanks for your time.
name: Mary Smith

content:
Based on the information you have provided, I suggest a rental price of 700 Euros per month. This price takes into account the size and location of the apartment, as well as the fact that you are a responsible and dependable tenant.

I am open to negotiating, so please feel free to suggest a different price that works for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month.

Thank you for your proposal, I will sign the lease agreement as soon as possible.

Thanks for your time.
name: Mary Smith

content: You're welcome! I'm glad we were able to come to an agreement that works for both of us. If you have any questions or concerns about the lease agreement, please don't hesitate to reach out. Good luck with your studies!
name: Heinrich Heine
